Headline: #29 State, #62 Archer Temporary Northbound Reroute near State/13th
ShortDescription: Northbound 29 State, 62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 13th, Wabash, Roosevelt and State: due to, street blockage near State/13th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #29 State, #62 Archer buses are temporarily rerouted via State, 13th, Wabash, Roosevelt and State: due to, street blockage near State/13th.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Westbound Reroute near  Clark/Addison
